channel.title: Abouts on mbielsk's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on mbielsk's notes

item.title: About
item.description: #Rambling So, what it is all about? In the middle of the next year (i.e. 2020) it will be ten years since I got mine M.Sc. diploma in Computer Science and started1 my professional career as a software developer. Hence, I decided it is a good time to stop for a moment and take a look back at the last ten years. And that’s how this weblog came to be.
